attributes.action: make all cyclists on the road take a theory test before they can use the road, and enforce road legislation against cyclists more. (for instance, dangerous cycling etc)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: are you a car driver? ever got angry at the cyclist in front of you who you nearly hit because they don't seem to know hoe to use the road? then this is the petition for you. sign up to ensure cyclists are governed the same way drivers are,and to stop them getting away with dangerous cycling
